# Gastown UI - LLM Context Index
# Generated: 2026-01-14T17:51:45.580Z
# Version: 0.1.0

## Project Overview

Gastown UI is the frontend dashboard for the Gas Town orchestration system.
It provides an operator console for managing AI agents, work convoys, merge
queues, and system health monitoring.

**Stack**: SvelteKit + Vite, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Bun
**Target**: Mobile-first PWA with offline support

## Quick Start

```bash
bun install
bun run dev      # http://localhost:5173
bun run build    # Production build
bun run check    # TypeScript check
```

## Architecture

```
src/
├── lib/
│   ├── components/   # 61 Svelte 5 components
│   ├── api/          # API client utilities
│   ├── stores/       # Svelte stores (WebSocket, state)
│   └── utils/        # Logger, keyboard, gestures
├── routes/
│   ├── api/          # SvelteKit API routes
│   └── [pages]/      # UI pages
└── static/           # Static assets, PWA manifest
```

## API Endpoints

| Method | Path | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| POST | /api/auth/login | - |
| POST | /api/auth/logout | - |
| GET | /api/auth/me | - |
| POST | /api/auth/refresh | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/convoys | - |
| POST | /api/gastown/escalations/:id/resolve | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/mail | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/rigs | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/snapshot | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/status | - |
| POST | /api/gastown/work/convoys | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/work/issues | - |
| POST | /api/gastown/work/issues | - |
| POST | /api/gastown/work/sling | - |
| POST | /api/gastown/workflows/cook | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/workflows/formulas | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/workflows/formulas/:name | - |
| GET | /api/gastown/workflows/molecules | - |
| POST | /api/gastown/workflows/pour | - |

## UI Pages

| Route | Purpose |
|-------|---------|
| / | Dashboard overview |
| /activity | - |
| /agents | Agent list and status |
| /agents/[id] | - |
| /convoys | Convoy tracking |
| /convoys/[id] | - |
| /crew | - |
| /dogs | - |
| /escalations | - |
| /escalations/[id] | - |
| /health | System health |
| /issues/[id] | - |
| /login | Authentication |
| /login/mobile | - |
| /logs | System logs |
| /mail | Notifications |
| /mail/[id] | - |
| /mail/compose | - |
| /queue | Merge queue |
| /rigs | Rig management |
| /seance | - |
| /settings | User settings |
| /stats | - |
| /watchdog | - |
| /work | Work management |
| /workflows | Workflow management |

## Component Library

### Accessibility
Announcer, KeyboardHelpDialog, LiveRegion, SkipLink, TouchTarget

### Core
Badge, Button, Icon, Input, Switch

### Data
ActivityFeed, AgentCard, DataTable, LogEntry, StatsCard, VirtualList

### Feedback
ApiError, EmptyState, ErrorBoundary, ErrorState, Toast, ToastContainer

### Layout
BottomNav, Dashboard, DashboardLayout, PageHeader, SheetNav, Sidebar, SplitView

### Loading
NavigationLoader, Skeleton, SkeletonCard, SkeletonGroup, SkeletonLoader

### Mobile
FloatingActionButton, OfflineIndicator, PullToRefresh, SwipeableItem, SwipeableTabs

### Other
AgentCardSkeleton, AgentDetailLayout, ConnectionLost, DegradedModeBanner, GridPattern, IssueTypeSelector, KnownBugDetector, LogEntrySkeleton, LogsLayout, MobileDashboard, NumberCounter, OperationCenter, QueueLayout, ShimmerText, ThemeToggle, UnreadDot, UpdatePrompt, WorkflowLayout

### Status
CircularProgress, ProgressBar, StatusBadge, StatusIndicator

## Error Codes

| Code | Meaning |
|------|---------|
| AUTH_EXPIRED | Session token expired |
| AUTH_INVALID | Invalid credentials |
| RATE_LIMITED | Too many requests |
| UPSTREAM_TIMEOUT | Backend CLI timeout |
| BEADS_ERROR | Issue tracker error |

## Security Features

- CSP headers (self + fonts.googleapis.com)
- CSRF double-submit cookie pattern
- HttpOnly auth cookies
- HSTS in production

## Accessibility

- WCAG 2.5.5 AAA touch targets (48px min)
- Safe area insets for notched devices
- Screen reader live regions
- prefers-reduced-motion support

## Environment Variables

```bash
VITE_WS_URL=ws://localhost:8080/ws
VITE_MOCK_API=true
```

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/Avyukth/gastown_ui
- Full docs: /llms-full.txt
